Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: {VV##233 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##234}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module GHC.List_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import GHC.List
 6: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: 
10: assume GHC.List.head         :: xs:{v: [a] | len v > 0} -> {v:a | v = head xs}
11: assume GHC.List.tail         :: xs:{v: [a] | len v > 0} -> {v: [a] | len(v) = (len(xs) - 1) && v = tail xs}
12: 
13: assume GHC.List.last         :: xs:{v: [a] | len v > 0} -> a
14: assume GHC.List.init         :: xs:{v: [a] | len v > 0} -> {v: [a] | len(v) = len(xs) - 1}
15: assume GHC.List.null         :: xs:[a] -> {v: GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> len(xs) = 0) }
16: assume GHC.List.length       :: xs:[a] -> {v: GHC.Types.Int | v = len(xs)}
17: assume GHC.List.filter       :: (a -> GHC.Types.Bool) -> xs:[a] -> {v: [a] | len(v) <= len(xs)}
18: assume GHC.List.scanl        :: (a -> b -> a) -> a -> xs:[b] -> {v: [a] | len(v) = 1 + len(xs) }
19: assume GHC.List.scanl1       :: (a -> a -> a) -> xs:{v: [a] | len(v) > 0} -> {v: [a] | len(v) = len(xs) }
20: assume GHC.List.foldr1       :: (a -> a -> a) -> xs:{v: [a] | len(v) > 0} -> a
21: assume GHC.List.scanr        :: (a -> b -> b) -> b -> xs:[a] -> {v: [b] | len(v) = 1 + len(xs) }
22: assume GHC.List.scanr1       :: (a -> a -> a) -> xs:{v: [a] | len(v) > 0} -> {v: [a] | len(v) = len(xs) }
23: 
24: lazy GHC.List.iterate
25: assume GHC.List.iterate :: (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
26: 
27: assume GHC.List.repeat :: a -> [a]
28: lazy GHC.List.repeat
29: 
30: assume GHC.List.replicate    :: n:Nat -> x:a -> {v: [{v:a | v = x}] | len(v) = n}
31: 
32: assume GHC.List.cycle        :: {v: [a] | len(v) > 0 } -> [a]
33: lazy GHC.List.cycle
34: 
35: assume GHC.List.takeWhile    :: (a -> GHC.Types.Bool) -> xs:[a] -> {v: [a] | len(v) <= len(xs)}
36: assume GHC.List.dropWhile    :: (a -> GHC.Types.Bool) -> xs:[a] -> {v: [a] | len(v) <= len(xs)}
37: 
38: assume GHC.List.take :: n:GHC.Types.Int
39:      -> xs:[a]
40:      -> {v:[a] | if n >= 0 then (len v = (if (len xs) < n then (len xs) else n)) else (len v = 0)}
41: assume GHC.List.drop :: n:GHC.Types.Int
42:      -> xs:[a]
43:      -> {v:[a] | (if (n >= 0) then (len(v) = (if (len(xs) < n) then 0 else len(xs) - n)) else ((len v) = (len xs)))}
44: 
45: assume GHC.List.splitAt :: n:_ -> x:[a] -> ({v:[a] | (if (n >= 0) then (if (len x) < n then (len v) = (len x) else (len v) = n) else ((len v) = 0))},[a])<{\x1 x2 -> (len x2) = (len x) - (len x1)}>
46: assume GHC.List.span    :: (a -> GHC.Types.Bool)
47:         -> xs:[a]
48:         -> ({v:[a]|((len v)<=(len xs))}, {v:[a]|((len v)<=(len xs))})
49: 
50: assume GHC.List.break :: (a -> GHC.Types.Bool) -> xs:[a] -> ([a],[a])<{\x y -> (len xs) = (len x) + (len y)}>
51: 
52: assume GHC.List.reverse      :: xs:[a] -> {v: [a] | len(v) = len(xs)}
53: 
54: //  Copy-pasted from len.hquals
55: qualif LenSum(v:[a], xs:[b], ys:[c]): len([v]) = (len([xs]) + len([ys]))
56: qualif LenSum(v:[a], xs:[b], ys:[c]): len([v]) = (len([xs]) - len([ys]))
57: 
58: assume GHC.List.!!         :: xs:[a] -> {v: _ | ((0 <= v) && (v < len(xs)))} -> a
59: 
60: 
61: assume GHC.List.zip :: xs : [a] -> ys:[b]
62:             -> {v : [(a, b)] | ((((len v) <= (len xs)) && ((len v) <= (len ys)))
            && (((len xs) = (len ys)) => ((len v) = (len xs))) )}
64: 
65: assume GHC.List.zipWith :: (a -> b -> c)
66:         -> xs : [a] -> ys:[b]
67:         -> {v : [c] | (((len v) <= (len xs)) && ((len v) <= (len ys)))}
68: 
69: assume GHC.List.errorEmptyList :: {v: _ | false} -> a
70: @-}
